languages.text: "Я не нашел свой генератор теневого поля, и мой комплект токсинов тоже исчез... но по крайней мере я отыскал свою любимую игрушку". {n}Друкари демонстрирует вам свою находку.{/n} "Известно ли тебе, что это, {name}?"
"I did not find my shadow field generator, and my toxin kit is gone too... but at least I have found my favourite toy." {n}The Drukhari shows you his find.{/n} "Do you know what this is, {name}?"
languages.original_text: "Я не нашел свой генератор теневого поля, и мой комплект токсинов тоже исчез... но по крайней мере я отыскал свою любимую игрушку". {n}Друкари демонстрирует вам свою находку.{/n} "Известно ли тебе, что это, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: "I did not find my shadow field generator, and my toxin kit is gone too... but at least I have found my favourite toy." {n}The Drukhari shows you his find.{/n} "Do you know what this is, {name}?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I did not find my shadow field generator, and my toxin kit is gone too... but at least I have found my favourite toy." {n}The Drukhari shows you his find.{/n} "Do you know what this is, {name}?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I did not find my shadow field generator, and my toxin kit is gone too... but at least I have found my favourite toy." {n}The Drukhari shows you his find.{/n} "Do you know what this is, {name}?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I did not find my shadow field generator, and my toxin kit is gone too... but at least I have found my favourite toy." {n}The Drukhari shows you his find.{/n} "Do you know what this is, {name}?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我的阴影场发生器不见了，毒药包也不知去向……不过，我至少找到了我最喜欢的玩具。”{n}玛拉斋向你展示着他找到的东西。{/n}“你知道这是什么吗，{name}？”
languages.original_text: "I did not find my shadow field generator, and my toxin kit is gone too... but at least I have found my favourite toy." {n}The Drukhari shows you his find.{/n} "Do you know what this is, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: “我的阴影场发生器不见了，毒药包也不知去向……不过，我至少找到了我最喜欢的玩具。”{n}玛拉斋向你展示着他找到的东西。{/n}“你知道这是什么吗，{name}？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「シャドウフィールド発生装置も毒素キットも見つからないが…かろうじて気に入りのオモチャは見つけられた」{n}デュカーリが見つけたものをこちらに見せる。{/n}「これが何か知っているか、{name}？」
languages.original_text: "I did not find my shadow field generator, and my toxin kit is gone too... but at least I have found my favourite toy." {n}The Drukhari shows you his find.{/n} "Do you know what this is, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: 「シャドウフィールド発生装置も毒素キットも見つからないが…かろうじて気に入りのオモチャは見つけられた」{n}デュカーリが見つけたものをこちらに見せる。{/n}「これが何か知っているか、{name}？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «No he encontrado mi generador de espiral de sombras, y mi estuche de toxinas también ha volado... pero al menos he encontrado mi juguete favorito». {n}El drukhari te enseña su hallazgo.{/n} «¿Sabes qué es esto, {name}?».
languages.original_text: "I did not find my shadow field generator, and my toxin kit is gone too... but at least I have found my favourite toy." {n}The Drukhari shows you his find.{/n} "Do you know what this is, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: «No he encontrado mi generador de espiral de sombras, y mi estuche de toxinas también ha volado... pero al menos he encontrado mi juguete favorito». {n}El drukhari te enseña su hallazgo.{/n} «¿Sabes qué es esto, {name}?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Aucune trace de mon générateur de champ d'ombre ni de ma panoplie de toxines, mais... au moins, j'ai fini par retrouver mon jouet préféré. Savez-vous ce que c'est, {name} ? » {n}demande le Drukhari en vous montrant sa trouvaille.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I did not find my shadow field generator, and my toxin kit is gone too... but at least I have found my favourite toy." {n}The Drukhari shows you his find.{/n} "Do you know what this is, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: « Aucune trace de mon générateur de champ d'ombre ni de ma panoplie de toxines, mais... au moins, j'ai fini par retrouver mon jouet préféré. Savez-vous ce que c'est, {name} ? » {n}demande le Drukhari en vous montrant sa trouvaille.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Meinen Schattenfeldgenerator konnte ich nicht finden und mein Toxinset ist auch verschwunden ... aber dafür habe ich mein Lieblingsspielzeug wiedergefunden." {n}Der Drukhari zeigt dir seinen Fund.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, was das ist, {name}?"
languages.original_text: "I did not find my shadow field generator, and my toxin kit is gone too... but at least I have found my favourite toy." {n}The Drukhari shows you his find.{/n} "Do you know what this is, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: "Meinen Schattenfeldgenerator konnte ich nicht finden und mein Toxinset ist auch verschwunden ... aber dafür habe ich mein Lieblingsspielzeug wiedergefunden." {n}Der Drukhari zeigt dir seinen Fund.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, was das ist, {name}?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Gölge alanı jeneratörümü bulamadım, toksin çantam da kaybolmuş... En azından en sevdiğim oyuncağımı buldum." {n}Drukhari, bulduğu eşyayı sana gösteriyor.{/n} "Bunun ne olduğunu biliyor musun {name}?"
languages.original_text: "I did not find my shadow field generator, and my toxin kit is gone too... but at least I have found my favourite toy." {n}The Drukhari shows you his find.{/n} "Do you know what this is, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: "Gölge alanı jeneratörümü bulamadım, toksin çantam da kaybolmuş... En azından en sevdiğim oyuncağımı buldum." {n}Drukhari, sana bulduğu eşyayı gösteriyor.{/n} "Bunun ne olduğunu biliyor musun {name}?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
